hypothesis_content.title: Neutral-to-Bull Transition via Breakout Above Weekly Volume-Weighted Average Price with ETF Flow Confirmation
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC is in NEUTRAL regime for >15 days, a bullish regime transition is signaled if: 1) BTC closes above its weekly VWAP (Volume-Weighted Average Price) on >1.5x average weekly volume, 2) US Bitcoin ETF net inflows exceed $200M over 3 days, and 3) BTC dominance increases while total crypto market cap expands. This predicts a 12-18% rally over 15 days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Extended neutral periods accumulate energy for directional moves. Breakout above VWAP with volume confirms institutional participation, while ETF inflows provide fundamental catalyst. Rising dominance amid market expansion indicates quality rotation into BTC leadership.
entry_conditions: Current regime = NEUTRAL for >15 consecutive days
BTC weekly close > weekly VWAP with volume > 1.5x 4-week avg
BTC dominance 3-day change > 0 AND total crypto market cap 3-day change > 3%
hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Signal triggers but BTC fails to sustain above weekly VWAP, or ETF inflows reverse to outflows within 5 days of signal.
